description: Rocky Linux is a Linux distribution developed by Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation, which is a privately owned benefit corporation that describes itself as a "self imposed not-for-profit".
name: ghcr.io/harrisonj94/kasm-rocky-9-desktop-custom:main
notes:
The Kasm Rocky Linux 9 Workspace requires libseccomp => 2.5.3 to run.

This can be checked by running runc --version

If you still want to run Rocky Linux 9 but do not have the minimum required libseccomp version, it can be run in an unsecure manner by adding: {"security_opt":["seccomp=unconfined"]} to the Docker Run Config Override (JSON) setting above.

NOTE: This will run the Workspace without the docker seccomp sandbox and will significantly reduce the amount of protection that Kasm Workspaces can provide.
